sys_script_include.description: Returns a nested tree structure of related records as an object. The input record represented in the GlideRecord object is returned as a pure object. The member "_related_records" is an array that contains the directly related records (these are records that reference to the given record) as objects. If the bApplicationFilesOnly parameter is true, only records derived from application files are considered as related records.
sys_script_include.name: GetRelatedRecordsTree
